attendingChurch: ﻿Attended from College of the Holy Cross

instNote: ﻿Under the direction of the Fathers of the Society of Jesus. The course of studies is that usually pursued in college of the Order.
﻿Under the direction of the Fathers of the Society of Jesus. The course of studies is that usually pursued in college of the Order.

﻿for day-scholars studying the collegiate course of English, Latin, Greek, Modern Languages, Mathematics, etc. The scholastic year is divided into two sessions, the first beginning in September, the second in February. Hours of attendance, from 8 1/2 a.m. too 2 1/2 p.m. Terms, $30 a session. A perpetual scholarship may be procured for the sum of $1000.
placeName: ﻿near the Church of the Immaculate Conception, Harrison Avenue
